timeline.author: Ldcabansay

replies.bodyText: Is it too weird to sort by name? Is name the 'extra-name' or null if they didn't add one? Or is it the full Dockstore identifier with github and path?
replies.author: Ldcabansay

replies.bodyText: We're sorting by entry ID in other places, so keeping it the same.
replies.author: garyluu
